refnamediv.refpurpose: Execute one or more write operations

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.changelog;
&Version; &Description;
PECL mongodb 1.4.4
MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException will be thrown if the "session" option is used in combination with an unacknowledged write concern.
PECL mongodb 1.4.0
The third parameter is now an options array. For backwards compatibility, this paramater will still accept a MongoDB\Driver\WriteConcern object.
PECL mongodb 1.3.0
MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException is now thrown if bulk does not contain any write operations. Previously, a MongoDB\Driver\Exception\BulkWriteException was thrown.
